properties.sql:
SELECT p.id as idProc, dp.c_n_processo as NProc, dp.c_n_agenda as NAgenda, dp.c_banco_fundo as Banco, dp.c_tipo_processo as TipoProcesso, 
sp.Id AS processId, sp.Name AS processName, sact.Id AS instanceId, sact.Name AS activityName, sass.ResourceId AS assignee, p.dateCreated, 
sact.Id AS ActivityId, hpp.c_gestor, hpp.c_data_puxar, ato.c_status as EstadoAgendamento, ato.c_flag_alteracoes_agenda as FlagAlteracoesAgenda
FROM shkprocesses sp 
LEFT JOIN shkprocesses sp2 on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = sp2.Id 
LEFT JOIN app_fd_processos_procu p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id 
LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_proce_procu dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State 
LEFT JOIN app_fd_atos ato ON ato.c_id_processo = p.id
LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State 
LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, t.c_id_processo, t.c_gestor, c_data_puxar FROM (SELECT MAX(c_data_puxar) as max_date, h.c_id_processo FROM app_fd_hist_puxar_procu h WHERE h.c_gestor != 'procuradoria_geral' GROUP BY h.c_id_processo) r 
INNER JOIN app_fd_hist_puxar_procu t ON r.c_id_processo = t.c_id_processo AND r.max_date = t.c_data_puxar AND c_gestor != 'procuradoria_geral') hpp ON hpp.c_id_processo = p.id 
LEFT JOIN (select ActivityId, group_concat(ResourceId separator '; ') as ResourceId from SHKAssignmentsTable group by ActivityId) sass on sact.Id = sass.ActivityId 
WHERE sps.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running' AND p.id is not null AND (ssta.oid = '1000001' OR ssta.oid = '1000003' OR ssta.oid = '1000005')
AND (ato.dateCreated = (SELECT MAX(dateCreated) FROM app_fd_atos a2 WHERE a2.c_id_processo = p.id) || ato.dateCreated IS null)
AND sp.id like '%PCDProcuradoria%' AND sass.ResourceId LIKE "%procuradoria_geral%"

properties.label: Puxar Processo
